name: Alchemy Deluxe
description:
A PICO-8 remake of Alchemy Deluxe, PopCap's 2001 game for PC (and later Mac). Music by @gruber_music

Controls
  • Arrow keys to move cursor
  • (X) to place tile
  • (O) to discard tile
Version History
  • 0.2.1 - Fixed: missing tile on game start
  • 0.2 - Tutorial; game music by @gruber_music
  • 0.1 - Initial public version
